title: How to Reattach Rear Window Glass to a Convertible Car Top

steps.title: Reattach the soft top material ("canvas") to the glass when just part of the canvas has detached so that the glass does not have to be re-centered within the hole in the canvas.
steps.content: Reattach the soft top material ("canvas") to the glass when just part of the canvas has detached so that the glass does not have to be re-centered within the hole in the canvas. If it does have to be re-centered one might do that by measuring distances with the defrosting grid as a guide and, in any case, holding the glass temporarily in place with gaffer's or other sticky tape.

steps.title: Open the top slightly so that it is not taut.
steps.content: Open the top slightly so that it is not taut. Prop something such as a small empty box between the front edge of the top and the upper edge of the windshield frame so that the top stays open slightly.

steps.title: Find the seal that was attached but has become unattached, such as the lower edge of the exterior layer of canvas.
steps.content: Find the seal that was attached but has become unattached, such as the lower edge of the exterior layer of canvas. [1] X Research source If dirt has accumulated in the pocket that has been exposed to the weather you may wish to vacuum out any large particles.

steps.title: If only a very small part has separated leave it alone.
steps.content: If only a very small part has separated leave it alone. If a large part is mostly separated you may wish to separate it entirely to re-seal it as one continuous piece. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Clean the mating surfaces with rubbing alcohol.
steps.content: Clean the mating surfaces with rubbing alcohol.

steps.title: Close the roof completely to see where the canvas falls on the glass when pulled gently flat as far in on the glass as it will go, but not pulled hard.
steps.content: Close the roof completely to see where the canvas falls on the glass when pulled gently flat as far in on the glass as it will go, but not pulled hard. At least in the case of cotton canvas, this will probably be not as far up onto the glass as originally (or as on a still-attached inside layer) because it will have shrunk since new.

steps.title: Re-open the roof slightly and re-prop it.
steps.content: Re-open the roof slightly and re-prop it.

steps.title: Apply a strip of double-sided foam tape such as 3M VHB ("very high bond")--foam so that it will conform to any irregularities, preferably black so ultraviolet rays will not promptly destroy its exposed edge--to the glass with the edge coming up to the point you determined previously.
steps.content: Apply a strip of double-sided foam tape such as 3M VHB ("very high bond")--foam so that it will conform to any irregularities, preferably black so ultraviolet rays will not promptly destroy its exposed edge--to the glass with the edge coming up to the point you determined previously. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Bring the middle of the area being attached (such as the middle, left-versus-right-wise of the bottom exterior canvas) up to the edge of the tape.
steps.content: Bring the middle of the area being attached (such as the middle, left-versus-right-wise of the bottom exterior canvas) up to the edge of the tape. It should have just a little slack, since it needs to be pulled basically smooth but not taut when the top is closed. Just a little slack when the top is closed is much better than tension, which will unstick the tape.

steps.title: Stick the canvas to the tape, working outward.
steps.content: Stick the canvas to the tape, working outward. The reason to work outward from a central point is so that any "excess" material does not build up at one side. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Rub down the canvas over the tape firmly and apply some heat--not a great painfully hot amount--with a blow dryer for a thorough bond.
steps.content: Rub down the canvas over the tape firmly and apply some heat--not a great painfully hot amount--with a blow dryer for a thorough bond. The convertible top should be fixed.
